yao1 zhui1 jian1 pan2 tu1 chu1 zheng4

sentences.english: The distribution of the lumbar plexus with reference to the markers at each lumbar segment was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析每个腰椎节段与腰丛有关标记物的分布情况。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of the intervertebral space infection after lumbar operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘术后椎间隙感染的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: ARE THERE DIFFERENT TYPES OF LAPAROSCOPIC SPINE OPERATIONS?
sentences.chinese: 有不同类型的腹腔镜腰椎手术吗？

sentences.english: Objective To sum up the clinical experience on treatment of thoracolumbar spinal fracture with reduction fixation system (RF system).
sentences.chinese: 目的总结RF系统手术治疗胸腰椎骨折的经验。

sentences.english: Results One of important causes is thecervical and lumbar herniated disc.
sentences.chinese: 结果发现颈腰椎间盘突出症是本病的重要原因。

sentences.english: Objective:To discuss clinical characteristic and treatment of silent lumbar disc herniation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨隐匿型腰椎间盘突出症的诊断与治疗。

sentences.english: Objective: To explore the experiences of perioperative nursing to the patients of thoracic and lumbar vertebra fracture combination with paralysis.
sentences.chinese: 目的总结胸腰椎骨折并截瘫的护理体会。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the double-interventional therapy of lumbar intervertebral disc herniation (LIDH) in the aged.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨双介入方法对老年腰椎间盘突出症的疗效。

sentences.english: Methods 42 cases of thoracolumbar fracture were treated by posterior AF internal fixation.
sentences.chinese: 方法对42例胸腰椎骨折患者行AF内固定。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of far-infrared thermal graphs for the diagnosis of lumbar disc herniation(LDH).
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨用远红外热像图诊断腰椎间盘突出症的价值。

sentences.english: Objective To assess therapeutic effect of acupuncture at Jiaji (EX-B 2) on hyperosteogeny of lumbar vertebrae.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价针刺夹脊穴为主治疗腰椎骨质增生症的疗效。

sentences.english: These factors should be considered for management of lumbar stenosis patients.
sentences.chinese: 在治疗腰椎管狭窄时，应该考虑到这些因素。

sentences.english: The lumbar facet joints osteoarthritis can be a potentially important source of low back pain.
sentences.chinese: 腰椎小关节骨性关节炎是导致下腰痛的常见病因。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of lumbar disc herniation with lumbar instability.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘突出症合并腰椎不稳的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of lumbar disc herniation with lumbar instability.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腰椎间盘突出症合并腰椎不稳的诊断和治疗。

sentences.english: This paper overviews the current progress in the clinical application of ALIF.
sentences.chinese: 本文对腰椎前路椎间融合术的临床应用现状进行综述。

definition: cervical vertebra/the seven cervical vertebrae in the neck of humans and most mammals
thoracic vertebra/the twelve thoracic vertebras behind the ribcage of humans and most mammals
sacrum (anatomy)/bone forming the base of the spinal column
